source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_00<tab>Konogg would attend to simpler matters before embarking on any further missions relating to unfathomable technology and the applications thereof.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_00<tab>アノッグの部屋のコノッグは、コメラの村の様子が気になるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_01<tab>You consult with Konogg, who mentions that he would like to check on the other villagers─a perfectly reasonable idea, given that if they are fine, they will have ale, and if not, they will need help. Even Anogg agrees to go, but before any of you can move a single step, raucous noise emanates from outside the door.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_01<tab>コノッグと話していると、外から大きな物音が聞こえてきた。機械遺跡の坑道の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_02<tab>The door opens to reveal quite a few dwarves of Komra present and not in the best of moods. Due to eyewitness accounts of a not entirely inaccurate but nevertheless incomplete nature, it seems that many have concluded Anogg and Konogg to be the source of the chaos. With tempers running high, it is impossible for the siblings to get a word in edgeways about their motivations or the dangers that remain, and thus Konogg begs you to explain the situation to the village elder in their stead.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_02<tab>コノッグと話した。コメラの村の村人たちは、アノッグとコノッグが、村を襲撃した２Ｐと関与していたことを知り、揉めているようだ。機械遺跡の坑道の「グラッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_03<tab>It transpires that the elder, Glagg, is keen to get proper grasp of the circumstances surrounding the disaster himself─though like the other villagers, he is fixated on apportioning blame to the exclusion of all else. Perhaps if you assist him in reconciling the villagers' differing perspectives, he will be more inclined to listen to your side of the story.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_03<tab>グラッグと話した。村が襲撃されたことの責任の所在を明らかにするため、それぞれ違った主張を持つ村人たちの話を聞いて、どの意見が正しいか判断してほしいと頼まれた。機械遺跡の坑道の「村人たち」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_04<tab>As you speak to the villagers, it immediately becomes clear why Glagg is having difficulty deriving a coherent conclusion from their disparate─and in some cases melodramatic─assertions. Hopefully your explanation can add some sense to the mix.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_04<tab>村人たちの意見を聞いた。機械遺跡の坑道の「グラッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_05<tab>You speak with Glagg, who is completely unsurprised by his people's unhelpfulness. In a last-ditch effort to weed out those who simply like yelling from those with actual knowledge of the situation, he asks for a show of hands. Alas, this directive too goes unheeded.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_05<tab>グラッグと話した。機械遺跡の坑道の「グラッグ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_06<tab>Finally having given up on making heads or tails of what the villagers have to say, Glagg turns to you for a conclusive verdict on who is at fault for this incident, at last providing you the opportunity to present your perspective. However, before he can announce said results to the people at large, he is interrupted by Anogg─who is in turn interrupted by 2B, whose sudden and menacing appearance sends the other dwarves fleeing in terror. Though she ostensibly merely found the argument over blame to be as pointless as it in fact was, Konogg has a sneaking suspicion that she intervened out of concern for the twins' welfare.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_06<tab>グラッグと話して、もっとも正しいと思う意見を選んだ。しかし、２Ｂが現れて、白いアンドロイドの襲撃の責任は、自身にあると話し、半ば力尽くで村人たちを解散させた。機械遺跡の坑道の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_07<tab>Given the kindness that she has shown him and his sister, Konogg feels it only right that he thank 2B. Presumably she may be found back at the bedside of her inert comrade.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_07<tab>コノッグと話した。機械遺跡の坑道の「コノッグ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_08<tab>You enter Anogg's hideaway to find Konogg attempting to convince 2B to come with him and speak with the villagers, concerned that as things stand, they will be unable to accept that 2B is on their side. She dismisses this as of no import, and without further ado hoists 9S over her shoulder and leaves─presumably to continue her campaign against the machines. Konogg worries for her, but also for Anogg, who was still racked with guilt when last you saw her.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_08<tab>コノッグと話した。村人たちに誤解されたままでも構わないと話す２Ｂは、９Ｓを連れて立ち去ってしまった。コノッグは、ふたりを見送った後、アノッグがいないことに気づく。機械遺跡の坑道の「コノッグ」とさらに話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_09<tab>You and Konogg proceed to the workspace where Anogg may usually be found, but she is nowhere to be seen. Panicking at the thought of his sister alone and at the mercy of angry villagers and hostile machines, Konogg implores you to search the area around Komra for any sign of her.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_09<tab>コノッグと話した。コルシア島のドヴェルガル山脈の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB00F01 /var>」で見渡して、アノッグを探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_10<tab>On your search for suitable brooding spots, you climb a ridge overlooking the path to the village. Alas, Anogg is not there, nor anywhere in view.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_10<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB00F01 /var>で見渡してアノッグを探したが、見つからなかった。ドヴェルガル山脈の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB01001 /var>」で再度見渡して、アノッグを探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_11<tab>You continue further afield to a contemplative sort of clifftop, but again you are disappointed.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_11<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB01001 /var>で再度見渡してアノッグを探したが、見つからなかった。ドワーフの洞窟の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB01101 /var>」でさらに見渡して、アノッグを探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_12<tab>Having glimpsed neither helm nor beard of Anogg elsewhere, you finally make your way to the Dwarven Hollows. Sadly, you discover that Anogg has not, in fact, decided to stop in the middle of a knocker-infested cave for a spot of soul-searching.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_12<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB01101 /var>でさらに見渡してアノッグを探したが、見つからなかった。コメラの村の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_13<tab>For want of ideas, you return to Komra to consult Konogg. You find that he has had no better luck in finding his sister, and his spirits are much the worse off for it. Where can she possibly have gone?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SEQ_13<tab>コノッグと話した。やはり、アノッグは見つからなかったようだ。２Ｐに騙されたとはいえ、村が襲われる原因を作ってしまったことを後悔するコノッグは、これからどうしたらいいのかと呟く。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_00<tab>コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Glagg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_01<tab>グラッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Komra's residents.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_02<tab>村人たちと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Glagg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_03<tab>グラッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Glagg again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_04<tab>グラッグと再度話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Konogg yet again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_07<tab>コノッグとさらに話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_08<tab>Survey the destination for signs of Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_08<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB00F01 /var>で見渡してアノッグを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_09<tab>Survey the next destination for signs of Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_09<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB01001 /var>で再度見渡してアノッグを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_10<tab>Survey the final destination for signs of Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_10<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB01101 /var>でさらに見渡してアノッグを探す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_11<tab>Speak with Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_TODO_11<tab>コノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_005<tab>I didn't think... I didn't <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_005<tab>ワタシは……何も……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_020<tab>Come to think of it, none of us ever did get the chance to enjoy the carnival.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_020そういえば、せっかくお祭りの準備をしたのに、
ゆっくり遊んだりなんて、できませんでしたね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_021<tab>It's possible everyone is still carrying on with it─I've never known a few explosions to dampen their spirits before. Still, I might go and check on them.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_021<tab>ボクはちょっと村の様子を見てきます。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_022<tab>Coming, Anogg?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_022<tab>アノッグも一緒に行くかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_023<tab>...Fine.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_023<tab>…………あぁ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_024<tab>What's all that noise?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_024ん……？
今のは何の音だ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_025<tab>I suppose there's only one way to find out...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_025<tab>ちょっと様子を見てこよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_050<tab>P-Please, we didn't mean for any of this to happen!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_050<tab>み……みんな、話を聞いてくれ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_055<tab>This is what I was afraid of.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_055<tab>参ったな……これは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_060<tab>Will you all <var 1A 02 /var>shut<var 1A 01 /var>─ Oh. Beg your pardon. Bit preoccupied with my duties at the moment.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_060コメラの村が崩壊した事件について、
責任を追及しなければならない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_065<tab>Them things came from right here! Saw it with my own two eyes, and that's that! I swear it on my granddad's grave!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_065俺は見たんだ！　ここで！
村を襲った奴が眠っているのを！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_070<tab>Always knew those brats were up to something...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_070アノッグとコノッグの奴、いつも何かを企んだりして、
あいつらは信用できないな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_075<tab>The village is in shambles! My house may as well be a pile of kindling!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_075村が崩壊して、家が潰れちまったんだ！
誰が責任取ってくれるんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_080<tab>Didn't like that. Did not like that <var 1A 02 /var>at all<var 1A 01 /var>, no <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_080恐ろしい……。
もう二度とこんな目にはあいたくない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_085<tab>Why me!?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_085<tab>いったいどうしてこんなことに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERF03954_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERF03954_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_120<tab>Please, calm down! It's a complicated situation, and even we are not fully─
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_120みんな……落ち着いてください……！
ワレワレも状況がよくわかってなくて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_121<tab>We ain't here for your excuses! Just admit it─ This is all your fault!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_121うるさい！　黙れ！
俺は、アノッグとコノッグが、この村を襲撃した奴を、
この坑道に匿っていたのを知っているんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_122<tab>You let those things in through the tunnels! They <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> you. And look what they did to the place!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_122お前らが襲撃犯に関与していたのは明白だ！
お前らのせいで、この村が崩壊したんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_123<tab>We don't care about the whys and wherefores. We want to know how you plan to make amends!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_123アノッグとコノッグ、より責任があるほうに、
この罪を償ってもらうぞ。
反論があるなら、ここで証明してみせろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_124<tab>We'll do everything we can, I swear! But...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_124<tab>そんなことを言われても……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_125<tab><sigh> I don't think this is going anywhere good. The village is still in danger!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_125<tab>みんな混乱していて……ボク達の話を聞いてくれない……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_126<tab>No one wants to hear it from me, though... Please, can you speak to Elder Glagg and make him understand?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_126旅人であるアナタの話なら、聞いてもらえるかもしれない。
村の最長老、「グラッグ」と話をしてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_140<tab>We never meant for any of this to happen!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_140ど……どうしたらいいんでしょう……。
とにかく、誤解を解かないと……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_140<tab>Please...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_140<tab>そんな…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_150<tab>And who might you be? Haven't seen your face around here before. Or...have I? I misplaced my spectacles some time ago.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_150おや、その格好……あんたは旅人か？
うーむ……なんだか見覚えがあるような、ないような……
まあよい、今はそんなこと気にしている場合ではないのじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_151<tab>No matter. I'm here to investigate, not conversate. As the eldest elder, it falls to me to determine the truth of the rumors surroundin' this disaster.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_151今回村が襲撃された件について、責任の所在を明らかにするために、
最長老たるワシがわざわざ出向いたのじゃが……

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_152<tab>The problem bein', of course, that everyone here is stubborn as a diamond ingot! They all insist they know what's true, though you can be sure half of them are up to their eyeballs in ale at any given time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_152村人たちに話を聞いてみても、
見事に意見が割れてしまっておってのう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_153<tab>I need a second opinion. A sober opinion. Here, let me smell your breath.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_153そうじゃ……
旅人のあんたならば、公正な目線を持てるかもしれん。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_154<tab><sniff> You'll do. Speak with the villagers, and think well on who has the right of it. Then I'll hear what you have to say.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_154どの村人の意見が正しいと思うか、
村人たちと話しながら考えて、見解を聞かせてくれんか。
考えが固まったら、ワシのもとへ来てくれい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_160<tab>I apologize for involving you in this nonsense on top of everything else...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_160<tab>こんなことになるだなんて……巻き込んでしまいすみません。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_161<tab>I'm so sorry...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_161<tab>…………すまない。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_200<tab>Blasted youth... No respect for proper procedure...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_200今回の事件によって村は未曽有の被害を受けた……
村人たちと話し、あんたの見解を聞かせてくれんか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_210<tab>This'll be Anogg's fault, you hear? That girl never had an onze of prudence. If only she were more like her brother...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_210村が襲撃された原因は、アノッグの軽率な行動にある！
きっとコノッグのように慎重に行動していれば、
村が襲撃されたりなんかしなかったはず！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_211<tab>She ought to have left that machine graveyard well enough alone! But she insisted on barging in anyway, heedless of all danger.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_211あれ？　もしかしてあなた噂の……
「アノッグの積極的な調査」に協力していた旅人じゃないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_212<tab>That's what happened, mark my words! And Anogg had better answer for it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_212私はアノッグが興味本位で機械遺跡に入り込んだことが、
今回の村の襲撃の原因になったと思っているんだ。
あなたもその一翼を担ったのなら、その責任を負うべきだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_213<tab>Konogg told her to be cautious─mark my words! And she ought to have heeded him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_213あれ？　もしかしてあなた噂の……
「コノッグの慎重な調査」に協力していた旅人じゃないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_214<tab>I can see from the look in your eye that you agree. I only hope Konogg doesn't end up answering for his sister's folly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_214あなたは正しい選択をしたようだね。
アノッグも、コノッグのように慎重な行動を心がけていたら、
村が襲撃されるようなことには、ならなかったんじゃないかな？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_215<tab>That Anogg...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_215村が襲撃された原因は、アノッグの軽率な行動にある！
きっとコノッグのように慎重に行動していれば、
村が襲撃されたりなんかしなかったはず！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_220<tab>Anogg could've saved us from those things, I just know it. There ain't no way a clever girl like her wouldn't have found a way to fight 'em. If only that brother of hers weren't always holding her back...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_220アノッグは問題を解決しようと、積極的に行動した！
それに比べてコノッグは、優柔不断で悩んでばかり……。
グズグズしていたコノッグよりも、行動したアノッグの方が正しい！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_221<tab>Wait...you're that outsider, ain't you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_221その見慣れない格好……。
「アノッグの積極的な調査」に協力していた旅人というのは、
あんたのことか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_222<tab>Don't worry─I don't blame <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. I can see you're the sort what knows how to take control of a situation. I'm sure you supported Anogg as best you could.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_222俺は、あんたの選択は正しかったと思うぞ！
アノッグはどんな問題も果敢に挑戦する気概のあるヤツだ。
どうやらあんたも気概があるみたいだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_223<tab>You ain't from around here, but trust me─Konogg's been making <var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var> problems <var 1A 02 /var>Anogg's<var 1A 01 /var> problems since they were little. It's a shame, too, because she's a real visionary.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_223その見慣れない格好……。
「コノッグの慎重な調査」に協力していた旅人というのは、
あんたのことか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_224<tab>If she'd had her way, she would've found out what was going on and how to put an end to it before those machines could make a beep!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_224コノッグの行動に協力していたなんてがっかりだ。
あんたがアノッグに協力していれば、
問題をもっと早く見つけられたかもしれないのに！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_225<tab>If it weren't for Konogg, I'd be enjoying a nice ale in front of my intact house right about now...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_225アノッグは問題を解決しようと、積極的に行動した！
それに比べてコノッグは、優柔不断で悩んでばかり……。
責めるならコノッグを責めるべきだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_230<tab>You... You're the <var 1A 02 /var>collaborator<var 1A 01 /var>. Well, don't think you can come crying to me now that it's all gone wrong.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_230僕が当事者だったら、慎重かつ積極的に問題を解決して、
村が崩壊するような結果は招かなかったね！
今回の件はアノッグとコノッグ、ふたりとも悪い！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_231<tab>It's plain as day that Anogg's the type to charge ahead without a care for who she might be getting mixed up in her troubles. And her brother ain't much better.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_231貴方のその格好は……例の旅人か。
アノッグ達に協力している旅人だって、噂になってるよ。
あんな奴らに関わるから、厄介なことに巻き込まれるのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_232<tab>It's plain as day that Konogg's not one for straightforward solutions. And his sister ain't much better, with her flights of fancy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_232貴方のその格好は……例の旅人か。
コノッグ達に協力している旅人だって、噂になってるよ。
あんな奴らに関わるから、厄介なことに巻き込まれるのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_235<tab>They don't have a bit of sense between the two of them, nor any respect for the village, neither. This would never have happened if it weren't for their meddling!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_235僕が当事者だったら、慎重かつ積極的に問題を解決して、
村が崩壊するような結果は招かなかったね！
今回の件はアノッグとコノッグ、ふたりとも悪い！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_240<tab>I didn't do it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_240私は機械遺跡のことなんて全然知らなかった！
だから私に責任はないぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_241<tab>Oh, Anogg and Konogg, you say? Yes, they did do it. It was them!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_241アノッグ達から聞いたが、あんたは過去に、
「アノッグの積極的な調査」に協力したらしいな！
あんたも責任を負う必要があるのではないか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_100_241<tab>And you... I heard you followed Anogg into the machine graveyard. Heard it with my own two ears, I did! Everyone knows it, too, so you'd better be prepared to pay!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_100_241あんたが「アノッグの積極的な調査」に協力していたことは、
他の村人達にも伝えておいたからな！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_242<tab>Oh, Anogg and Konogg, you say? Yes, they did do it. It was them!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_242コノッグ達から聞いたが、あんたは過去に、
「コノッグの慎重な調査」に協力したらしいな！
あんたも責任を負う必要があるのではないか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_100_242<tab>And you... I heard you followed Konogg into the machine graveyard. Heard it with my own two ears, I did! Everyone knows it, too, so you'd better be prepared to pay!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_100_242あんたが「コノッグの慎重な調査」に協力していたことは、
他の村人達にも伝えておいたからな！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_245<tab>I didn't know about any of this! You can't prove I did!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_245私は機械遺跡のことなんて全然知らなかった！
だから私に責任はないぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_250<tab>Lali-I knew we'd end up here someday-ho.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_250参ったな……こんなことになるなんて……
ま、まずは皆の意見を聞かないと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_251<tab>It's hard to know where to place the blame.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_251旅の人は以前「アノッグの積極的な調査」に協力してたな……
その行動の積極性は認めるが、
それが災いを生んでしまったのかもしれないな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_252<tab>I understand why you followed along with Anogg's plan, but if you all had been just a little more careful...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_252<tab>しかし俺には、誰が悪いかなんてわからない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_253<tab>It's hard to know where to place the blame.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_253旅の人は以前「コノッグの慎重な調査」に協力してたな……
その行動は慎重だったが、
何も行動しないヤツが本当に偉いんだろうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_254<tab>I understand why you followed along with Konogg's plan, but if you all had been quicker to deal with the threat...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_254<tab>しかし俺には、誰が悪いかなんてわからない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_255<tab>I just don't know. Maybe the fault is mine.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_255俺には、誰が悪いかなんてわからない……。
まずは皆の意見を聞かないと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_260<tab>You want to know what I think? We're doomed! Doooooomed!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_260すべてがめちゃくちゃになってしまった……。
こんな状態じゃ何も考えられない。
もうだめだ……この村は終わりだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_265<tab>Doooooom!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_265もうだめだ……こんな状態じゃ何も考えられない。
この村は終わりだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_280<tab>Were we...that wrong? Didn't we try our hardest?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_280<tab>ボク達がしたことは……間違っていたのでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_281<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_281<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_300<tab>So the fools still can't agree on which way is up. Wish I was surprised.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_300ふむ……
各々の意見がバラバラでまとまりそうにないか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_301<tab>Let's try puttin' it to a vote, eh? Maybe the ones pretendin' to know more about the matter than they really do will think twice about makin' arses of themselves so publicly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_301じゃが、こういうときこそ冷静にならなければならぬ。
結局だれが責任を負うのか……
ここにいる者たちの投票で決めることにするぞい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_302<tab>Can't none of you stitch your beards for half a moment!? I'm askin' you to raise your hands in an orderly fashion!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_302お前らいい加減にせい！
こんな状態じゃ、まともに投票も始められんわい！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_303<tab>This is hopeless. We're not gettin' anything useful from them.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_303<tab>仕方ない……おい旅の人よ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_304<tab>I'm not ruling out that one of these idiots accidentally has the right of it, but... In your sober judgment, who's to blame?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_304これまでの旅で得た経験を活かし、
正しい判断というものを示してくれい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_305<tab>If you still ain't sure, you can try talkin' to everyone again...though I can't say I recommend it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_305どの意見を選ぶか迷っておるなら、
もう一度村人たちの話を聞いてみてもよかろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_306<tab>Just make sure you don't take any detours past the ale casks until this is settled.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_306<tab>選ぶ意見が決まったら、ワシに話しかけるのじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_310<tab>Only Anogg would be so reckless as to bring the whole village crashing down around our ears!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERE03954_000_310アノッグの行動が、村が崩壊した原因に違いない！
だから私の意見は、アノッグが悪いということだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_315<tab>This is what dithering and dragging your feet gets you, I tell you! Ain't no one to blame but Konogg for it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERC03954_000_315村が崩壊した原因は、
コノッグが優柔不断で悩んでばかりいたからだ！
だから俺の意見は、コノッグが悪いということだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_320<tab>I don't know how to make it any plainer─Anogg and Konogg are to blame here. Fools, the both of them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERB03954_000_320僕の意見はアノッグとコノッグふたりとも悪いということだ！
だって僕が当事者なら、こんな結果は招かなかったからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_325<tab>I haven't said anything we don't all know already! So don't even think about trying to pin this on me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERA03954_000_325え？　私の意見？　そんなものないよ！
とにかく、私に責任はないからな！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_330<tab>It's important to hear people out, don't get me wrong─but they do have a tendency to oversimplify. And yell. Loudly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_330みんなの意見を集めることが大事だと思ってるんだが、
意見がバラバラな時には、どうしたらいいのかわからないんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_335<tab>We're all done for...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERD03954_000_335もうだめだ……この村は終わりだよ……。
こんなことになって、立ち直れない。
僕はこの村は終わりだと思う……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_350<tab><sniff> Still passably sober, I see. Have you come to a conclusion?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_350意見は決まったようじゃな。
あんたはどの村人の意見を選ぶのじゃ？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_Q1_000_000<tab>どの意見が正しい？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_001<tab>It's Anogg's fault.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_001<tab>「アノッグが悪い」という用心深い村人の意見

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_002<tab>It's Konogg's fault.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_002<tab>「コノッグが悪い」という勇ましい村人の意見

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_003<tab>Both Anogg and Konogg are to blame.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_003<tab>「アノッグとコノッグが悪い」という利口な村人の意見

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_004<tab>It's complicated.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_004<tab>「どうしたらいいのかわからない」というドワーフ族の親方の意見

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_005<tab>You're all doomed! Doooooomed!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_005<tab>「この村は終わりだ」という弱気な村人の意見

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_006<tab>I haven't decided yet.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_A1_000_006<tab>もう少し考える

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_352<tab>Take your time. I'll be keepin' an eye on this lot.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_352あぁ、これは大切な選択じゃからな。
ゆっくり考えるがいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_353<tab>Interestin'. I'll take that under advisement.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_353なるほど……わかった。
あとは、最長老であるワシが話をまとめよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_354<tab>Ahem! Everyone, I stand before you to present my findin's regardin' culpability in the destruction that has befallen our village...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_GLAGG_000_354静粛に……！
今回村が襲撃された事件について、
責任を負うべき者を決定する…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_355<tab>Please, wait! It's m─
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_355ちょっと待って！
聞いてくれ……今回の事件はワタシが……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_356<tab>As I've said, blaming yourselves is pointless. This is my doing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_356白いアンドロイド達による襲撃、
その責任を取るべき者がいるとすれば、私だ。
だから、こんな言い争いは無意味……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERK03954_000_357<tab>It's one of <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var>! Run! Run for your lives!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_VILLAGERK03954_000_357お……おい、あれは！
この村を襲った奴とそっくりだ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_358<tab>Are you...defending us?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_358<tab>２Ｂ……ボク達のこと、助けてくれたの……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_359<tab>There's no benefit to petty arguments.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_359<tab>下らない諍いに、興味はない。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_360<tab>W-Wait!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_360<tab>あっ……ねぇ、ちょっと！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_361<tab>She says that...but I think it was kind of her to intervene.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_361きっと２Ｂはボク達を助けてくれたんだ。
お礼を言いに行かないと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_365<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_365<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_370<tab>I'll try speaking to the others─see if I can't get them to understand that there's more going on here than it appears.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_DWARFMASTER03671_000_370俺からも、村の奴らに説明をしてみるよ、
聞く耳を持ってもらえるかはわからないが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_375<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_ANOGG_000_375<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_400<tab>I'm sure she went to check on her friend─that other android, 9S. I'm going to go and talk to her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_400２Ｂは少年のアンドロイド……９Ｓのもとに向かったようです。
追いかけましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_401<tab>I appreciate your stepping in─but I don't want everyone to see <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> as the enemy. If we go and talk to them now, we can explain...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_401助けて……くれたんだよね、ありがとう。
でも、このままでは２Ｂまで敵だと思われてしまう……。
村人達の誤解を解こうよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_402<tab>That's not necessary. I'm leaving anyway.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_402いや、その必要はない。
私はここを去る。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_403<tab>This is not over. For us, or the machines.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_2B_000_403まだすべてが終わった訳じゃない。
私達も、敵も……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_404<tab>What are you thinking, 2B...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_404<tab>２Ｂ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_405<tab>I'm worried for Anogg, as well. She hasn't been herself since...well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_405あれ？　そういえば、アノッグが見当たらない？
まだ拠点の作業場にいるのかな？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_406<tab>If she's not here, she's probably drowning herself in work. Come on─we should check on her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_406アノッグのことが心配なので、
ちょっと様子を見に行きましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_450<tab>She's not here! What is she doing!? This isn't the time to be outside alone!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_450大変です！　アノッグがいないんです！
今はむやみに出歩かないほうがいいんじゃないかな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_451<tab>We need to find her! I'll look around the village, but...can you search the outskirts?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_451手分けして、一緒にアノッグを探してくれませんか……！
ボクはコメラの村の中を探してみます。
アナタは村の周辺を見回ってください。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_452<tab>Oh, Anogg...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_452<tab>辺りを見回ったあとは、村の真ん中で合流しましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>You see no sign of your despondent dwarven friend. Perhaps she wandered further afield...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SYSTEM_000_500アノッグの姿は見当たらない……。
別の場所を探してみよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>Though you have searched all of the likely places, Anogg is not to be found. Perhaps Konogg has some additional ideas...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_SYSTEM_000_501どこを探しても、アノッグの姿は見当たらない……。
一度コメラの村に戻って、「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_550<tab>Anogg isn't with you?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_550<tab>アノッグは見つかりましたか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_551<tab>...What do I do? This is all because of us, and I...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_551村もこんな状態になってしまって、
みんなに迷惑をかけて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_100_551<tab>I don't know how to find her.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_100_551<tab>２Ｂは消え、アノッグも帰ってこない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_552<tab>I'm...not used to being alone...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA303_03954_KONOGG_000_552ボクは……
これからどうしたらいいんだろう……。
